page.title: 06THE SHRUBBERY AND CHAPEL
page.content: The Shrubbery is the headquarters of the West Essex Farmers Group.To look after the varied crops they employ an agronomist,Jeremy Finiss.He gives advice on fertilisers and sprays. The main use of the Shrubbery,however,is to help the farmers market their products.The Group has used the Shrubbery premises since 1980. The Victorian chapel next door,which had been disused for 21 years,was knocked down and the land now belongs to the Shrubbery.Some of the bricks from the chapel were used to extend the building recently.
